titleStmt.title: The nevv birth: or, A treatise of regeneration delivered in certaine sermons; and now published by William Whately, preacher and minisiter of Banbury in Oxfordshire.
titleStmt.author: Whately, William, 1583-1639.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kingston, for Thomas Man, and are to be sold at his shop in Pater-Noster-Row, at the signe of the Talbot,

notesStmt.note: Includes folding table, bound after title page.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pater-Noster-Row, at the signe of the Talbot
